attributes.action: Change the definition of who is a women
attributes.additional_details:
I believe wholeheartedly that trans women should be accepted as women.
This is not just to be the staunch ally that I am but too SAVE LIVES,
Future trans kids will look to this day and foresee a future that does not include them in it their will be young trans committing suicide because of this decision, WE as a forward thinking INCLUSIVE nation NEED to stand up and be counted to show we stand with our trans communities and show the world that we as a nation stand by what is right
attributes.background: To change the definition of who is a women to include those of transgender orientation

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Amend Equality Act to define the terms woman and man not based on biological sex
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725223
